text: Kazaly ( or Kazalinsk ) is a city in the Kyzylorda Region of Kazakhstan. The city is located on the right bank of the Syr Darya River. As of 2023, the population of the city is 7,428. Kazaly was founded in 1853 and got city status in 1867. ==References== Category:1853 establishments Category:1850s establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in Kazakhstan Category:Cities and towns in Kazakhstan Category:Turkistan Region
title: Kazalinsk
